metadata.Title: CVE-2020-23452 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: A cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Selenium Grid v3.141.59 allows attackers to execute arbitrary web scripts or HTML via a crafted payload injected into the hub parameter under the /grid/console page.

criterions.comment: python-selenium: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
